summary: Overhauls NPCs from the beloved mod Interesting NPCs by kristakahashi. Not lore-friendly. Run if that bugs you.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#0B5394][size=4][color=#85200C]Warning: This mod is NOT "lore-friendly". If that bugs you, please don't download or comment. Don't waste our time, man. Thanks.[/color]

[color=#1155Cc][size=5]Overview[/size][/color]
[/size][/color]This mod changes the appearance of NPCs from the rightfully popular mod Interesting NPCs, by kristakahashi. It is not lore-friendly at all. I plan to overhaul all of the NPCs, excluding the khajiit and argonians.

[color=#1155Cc][size=5]Requirements[/size][/color]
[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs by kristakahashi[/url][/size]
RaceCompatability
Dawnguard DLC

[color=#1155Cc][size=5]Currently Overhauled NPCs[/size][/color]
Note: All versions of the NPCs below are overhauled

Solitude:
* Fironet

Falkreath:
* Henrietta Entius
* Isobel
* Jerulith
* Melea Entius

Riften:
* Olette

Riverwood:
* Hjoromir

Whiterun:
* Eldawyn

Windhelm:
* Shelur Ice-Eye
* Valla

Misc. Locations/Travelers:
* Amalee
* Ange The Song-Bearer
* Rumarin


[color=#1155Cc][size=5]Compatability
[size=3][color=#ffffff]Should be fine with anything, except other overhauls. You may want to load patches for the original mod after this, though.
[color=#0000ff][size=5]
[color=#1155Cc]Possible Issues[/color][/size][/color][/color][/size][/size][/color]

[i]Lag -[/i]
Make sure you have XP32 Skeleton Extended if you use HDT Physics Extensions.

[i]Face Mismatch/Neck Seam -[/i]
Skyrim likes to store the weights of the NPCs with your saved game, so a
sudden change in their weight can make their face not match or fit their
body. You can fix this by opening the console with the ~ button on your
keyboard, clicking on the affected NPC, typing setnpcweight (any value from 0 to 100), then pressing enter,
disabling, and enabling.

[i]Ugly Faces -[/i]
You most likely have a conflict or are somehow missing the facegen data. If you Nexus
Mod Manager, you'll probably have to reinstall my mod. I'd highly
recommend Mod Organizer though because it lets you keep all the original
files in your mods, without them overwriting each other. Not to mention
it helps you see what mods conflict with what. And it doesn't crash
every two minutes. If you use MO, make sure your mod order on the left
side is the same as the load order on the right.

[i]Purple/blue Hairs, Foreheads, or Eyes-[/i]
I somehow missed a texture. Please let me know if this happens, and tell
me which NPC(s) it is. If I don't respond or update for a while, you
should probably download the mods in my credits section, just in case.
[i]
Pixelated Makeup - [/i]
Make sure you have your facetint set to 2048 in your skse ini file.

[i]Black face bug -[/i]
I really don't know why this happens. I've seen it happen with using Visual NPC
Transfers as well. Try changing the NPC's weight to 0 in the console,
then disabling, and enabling them. This should make their face normal
again.

[i]My males don't have nice, smooth skin like yours in the screenshots! OnO
[/i]I made a [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/articles/51089/?]tutorial[/url] on how to get the same effect! Thanks to aulie for the lovely textures!

[size=5]~Credits~[/size]
[size=4]Interesting NPCs by Kristakahashi

~ Tutorials Used ~[/size]

* [url=http://tes5stuff.blogspot.com/2015/10/ece-character-to-create-npcfollower.html]ECE Character to NPC by JRCosta[/url]
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?%20*%20Dark%20Face%20Bug%20https://www.creationkit.com/index.php?title=Dark_Face_Bug]Enhanced Character Edit Description by tktk[/url]
* [url=https://www.creationkit.com/index.php?title=Dark_Face_Bug]Dark Face Bug[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Using_a_face_made_with_RaceMenu_on_an_NPC_for_Skyrim]Using a Face Made with RaceMenu on an NPC for Skyrim[/url]
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?tab=5&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D8429%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D1646388&pUp=1]Terrible Ten Minute Tutorial on Editing 3DNPC Faces
[/url]

[size=4]Recommended to Look Like Screenshots:[/size]
* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20343/?]RAN's Eye Reflection Extender[/url]

[/url]* [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/369/?]Less Harsh Elves[/url]

[size=5][i]Thank you to all modders and developers for the tutorials and permission to use your resources!
And thank you, Kristakahashi, for your epic mod and for letting us make our edits to it![/i][/size]

[color=#900000][size=4][b]Permissions:
PLEASE DO NOT RE-UPLOAD THIS TO OTHER SITES. THIS IS NEXUS-ONLY. Don't post it
in forums either just because, please. Please just give a link to the
original download.
Also, please do not use any of the facegen data for your own mods (unless they are only for personal use). THIS INCLUDES IMPORTING THEM INTO RACEMENU AND EDITING THEM.
There are many assets in this mod that do not belong to me, but are used with
permission from the authors. If you want to use them, you'll have to
download their original files, and ask the authors yourself (or read the
description and check the tags).
Thank you![/b][/size][/color][size=4][b]
[/b][/size]
author: TheK8iKat
